24 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_INITIALIZER>
25 void initializeElements(std::vector<T>& array, const ELEMENT_INITIALIZER& elementInitializer)
26 {
27  size_t index = 0;
28  for (auto&& element : array)
29  {
30  elementInitializer.initialize(element, index);
31  index++;
32  }
33 }
34 
44 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
45 size_t bitSizeOf(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
46  size_t bitPosition)
47 {
48  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT)
49  return array.empty() ? 0 : arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0)) * array.size();
50 
51  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
52  for (const typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type& element : array)
53  endBitPosition += arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(endBitPosition, element);
54 
55  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
56 }
57 
67 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
68 size_t bitSizeOfAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
69  size_t bitPosition)
70 {
71  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
72  const size_t arraySize = array.size();
73  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT && arraySize > 0)
74  {
75  const size_t elementBitSize = arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0));
76  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
77  endBitPosition += (arraySize - 1) * alignTo(8, elementBitSize) + elementBitSize;
78  }
79  else
80  {
81  for (const typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type& element : array)
82  {
83  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
84  endBitPosition += arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(endBitPosition, element);
85  }
86  }
87 
88  return endBitPosition - bitPosition;
89 }
90 
100 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
101 size_t bitSizeOfAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
102  size_t bitPosition)
103 {
104  const size_t lengthBitSizeOf = zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size()));
105 
106  return lengthBitSizeOf + bitSizeOf(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + lengthBitSizeOf);
107 }
108 
118 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
119 size_t bitSizeOfAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
120  const std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition)
121 {
122  const size_t lengthBitSizeOf = zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size()));
123 
124  return lengthBitSizeOf + bitSizeOfAligned(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition + lengthBitSizeOf);
125 }
126 
136 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
137 size_t initializeOffsets(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
138  size_t bitPosition)
139 {
140  if (ARRAY_TRAITS::IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT)
141  {
142  return bitPosition +
143  (array.empty() ? 0 : array.size() * arrayTraits.bitSizeOf(bitPosition, array.at(0)));
144  }
145 
146  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
147  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
148  for (auto&& element : array)
149  endBitPosition = arrayTraits.initializeOffsets(endBitPosition, element);
150 
151  return endBitPosition;
152 }
153 
164 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER>
165 size_t initializeOffsetsAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
166  std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition,
167  const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
168 {
169  size_t endBitPosition = bitPosition;
170  size_t index = 0;
171  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
172  for (auto&& element : array)
173  {
174  endBitPosition = alignTo(8, endBitPosition);
175  offsetInitializer.initializeOffset(index, bitsToBytes(endBitPosition));
176  endBitPosition = arrayTraits.initializeOffsets(endBitPosition, element);
177  index++;
178  }
179 
180  return endBitPosition;
181 }
182 
192 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
193 size_t initializeOffsetsAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
194  size_t bitPosition)
195 {
196  return initializeOffsets(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition +
197  zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size())));
198 }
199 
210 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_INITIALIZER>
211 size_t initializeOffsetsAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits,
212  std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, size_t bitPosition,
213  const OFFSET_INITIALIZER& offsetInitializer)
214 {
215  return initializeOffsetsAligned(arrayTraits, array, bitPosition +
216  zserio::bitSizeOfVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size())), offsetInitializer);
217 }
218 
227 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
228 void read(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array, BitStreamReader& in,
229  size_t size)
230 {
231  array.clear();
232  array.reserve(size);
233  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
234  arrayTraits.read(array, in, index);
235 }
236 
246 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
247 void readAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
248  BitStreamReader& in, size_t size, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
249 {
250  array.clear();
251  array.reserve(size);
252  for (size_t index = 0; index < size; ++index)
253  {
254  in.alignTo(8);
255  offsetChecker.checkOffset(index, bitsToBytes(in.getBitPosition()));
256  arrayTraits.read(array, in, index);
257  }
258 }
259 
267 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
268 void readAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
269  BitStreamReader& in)
270 {
271  const uint32_t arraySize = in.readVarSize();
272  read(arrayTraits, array, in, static_cast<size_t>(arraySize));
273 }
274 
283 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
284 void readAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
285  BitStreamReader& in, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
286 {
287  const uint32_t arraySize = in.readVarSize();
288  readAligned(arrayTraits, array, in, static_cast<size_t>(arraySize), offsetChecker);
289 }
290 
298 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
299 void readImplicit(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
300  BitStreamReader& in)
301 {
302  static_assert(arrayTraits.IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT, "Implicit array elements must have constant bit size!");
303  const size_t remainingBits = in.getBufferBitSize() - in.getBitPosition();
304  const size_t arraySize = remainingBits / arrayTraits.bitSizeOf();
305  read(arrayTraits, array, in, arraySize);
306 }
307 
315 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
316 void write(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
317  BitStreamWriter& out)
318 {
319  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
320  for (auto&& element : array)
321  arrayTraits.write(out, element);
322 }
323 
332 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
333 void writeAligned(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
334  BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
335 {
336  size_t index = 0;
337  // can't use 'typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type&' because std::vector<bool> returns rvalue
338  for (auto&& element : array)
339  {
340  out.alignTo(8);
341  offsetChecker.checkOffset(index, bitsToBytes(out.getBitPosition()));
342  arrayTraits.write(out, element);
343  index++;
344  }
345 }
346 
354 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS>
355 void writeAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
356  BitStreamWriter& out)
357 {
358  out.writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size()));
359  write(arrayTraits, array, out);
360 }
361 
370 template <typename ARRAY_TRAITS, typename OFFSET_CHECKER>
371 void writeAlignedAuto(const ARRAY_TRAITS& arrayTraits, std::vector<typename ARRAY_TRAITS::type>& array,
372  BitStreamWriter& out, const OFFSET_CHECKER& offsetChecker)
373 {
374  out.writeVarSize(convertSizeToUInt32(array.size()));
375  writeAligned(arrayTraits, array, out, offsetChecker);
376 }

381 template <typename T>
382 T read_bits(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits);
383 
384 template <>
385 inline int8_t read_bits<int8_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
386 {
387  return static_cast<int8_t>(in.readSignedBits(numBits));
388 }
389 
390 template <>
391 inline int16_t read_bits<int16_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
392 {
393  return static_cast<int16_t>(in.readSignedBits(numBits));
394 }
395 
396 template <>
397 inline int32_t read_bits<int32_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
398 {
399  return in.readSignedBits(numBits);
400 }
401 
402 template <>
403 inline int64_t read_bits<int64_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
404 {
405  return in.readSignedBits64(numBits);
406 }

409 inline uint8_t read_bits<uint8_t>(BitStreamReader& in, uint8_t numBits)
410 {
411  return static_cast<uint8_t>(in.readBits(numBits));
412 }

437 {

484 
488 template <typename T>
489 class BitFieldArrayTraits
490 {
491 public:
493  typedef T type;
494 
500  explicit BitFieldArrayTraits(uint8_t numBits) : m_numBits(numBits)
501  {
502  }
503 
509  size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type) const
510  {
511  return bitSizeOf();
512  }
513 
519  size_t bitSizeOf() const
520  {
521  return m_numBits;
522  }
523 
531  size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type) const
532  {
533  return bitPosition + m_numBits;
534  }
535 
542  void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t) const
543  {
544  array.push_back(detail::read_bits<type>(in, m_numBits));
545  }
546 
553  void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value) const
554  {
555  detail::write_bits(out, value, m_numBits);
556  }
557 
559  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
560 
561 private:
562  uint8_t m_numBits;
563 };
564 
568 template <typename T>
569 struct StdIntArrayTraits
570 {
572  typedef T type;
573 
579  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
580  {
581  return bitSizeOf();
582  }
583 
589  static size_t bitSizeOf()
590  {
591  return NUM_BITS;
592  }
593 
601  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type)
602  {
603  return bitPosition + NUM_BITS;
604  }
605 
612  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
613  {
614  array.push_back(detail::read_bits<type>(in, NUM_BITS));
615  }
616 
623  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
624  {
625  detail::write_bits(out, value, NUM_BITS);
626  }
627 
629  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
630 
631 private:
632  static const uint8_t NUM_BITS = sizeof(type) * 8;
633 };

644 template <>
645 struct VarIntNNArrayTraits<int16_t>
646 {
648  typedef int16_t type;
649 
657  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type value)
658  {
659  return zserio::bitSizeOfVarInt16(value);
660  }
661 
670  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
671  {
672  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
673  }
674 
681  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
682  {
683  array.push_back(in.readVarInt16());
684  }
685 
692  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
693  {
694  out.writeVarInt16(value);
695  }
696 
698  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
699 
700 };

1257 struct Float32ArrayTraits
1258 {
1260  typedef float type;
1261 
1267  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
1268  {
1269  return bitSizeOf();
1270  }
1271 
1277  static size_t bitSizeOf()
1278  {
1279  return 32;
1280  }
1281 
1290  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1291  {
1292  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1293  }
1294 
1301  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1302  {
1303  array.push_back(in.readFloat32());
1304  }
1305 
1312  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1313  {
1314  out.writeFloat32(value);
1315  }
1316 
1318  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
1319 };
1320 
1324 struct Float64ArrayTraits
1325 {
1327  typedef double type;
1328 
1334  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
1335  {
1336  return bitSizeOf();
1337  }
1338 
1344  static size_t bitSizeOf()
1345  {
1346  return 64;
1347  }
1348 
1357  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1358  {
1359  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1360  }
1361 
1368  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1369  {
1370  array.push_back(in.readFloat64());
1371  }
1372 
1379  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1380  {
1381  out.writeFloat64(value);
1382  }
1383 
1385  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = true;
1386 };
1387 
1391 struct BoolArrayTraits
1392 {

1395 
1401  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type)
1402  {
1403  return bitSizeOf();
1404  }
1405 
1411  static size_t bitSizeOf()

1413  return 1;
1414  }
1415

1425  {

1427  }

1449  }

1454 
1458 struct StringArrayTraits

1462 
1470  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, const type& value)
1471  {
1472  return zserio::bitSizeOfString(value);
1473  }
1474

1484  {

1486  }

1513 
1517 struct BitBufferArrayTraits
1518 {
1520  typedef zserio::BitBuffer type;
1521 
1529  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, const type& value)
1530  {
1531  return zserio::bitSizeOfBitBuffer(value);
1532  }
1533 
1542  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, const type& value)
1543  {
1544  return bitPosition + bitSizeOf(bitPosition, value);
1545  }
1546 
1553  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1554  {
1555  array.push_back(in.readBitBuffer());
1556  }
1557 
1564  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, const type& value)
1565  {
1566  out.writeBitBuffer(value);
1567  }
1568 
1570  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1571 };
1572 
1576 template <typename T>
1577 struct EnumArrayTraits
1578 {
1580  typedef T type;
1581 
1589  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type value)
1590  {
1591  return zserio::bitSizeOf(value);
1592  }
1593 
1602  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1603  {
1604  return zserio::initializeOffsets(bitPosition, value);
1605  }
1606 
1613  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1614  {
1615  array.push_back(zserio::read<type>(in));
1616  }
1617 
1624  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type value)
1625  {
1626  zserio::write(out, value);
1627  }
1628 
1629  // Be aware that T can be varuint, so bitSizeOf cannot return constant value.
1631  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1632 };
1633 
1637 template <typename T>
1638 struct BitmaskArrayTraits
1639 {
1641  typedef T type;
1642 
1650  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t, type value)
1651  {
1652  return value.bitSizeOf();
1653  }
1654 
1663  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type value)
1664  {
1665  return value.initializeOffsets(bitPosition);
1666  }
1667 
1674  static void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t)
1675  {
1676  array.emplace_back(in);
1677  }
1678 
1685  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, const type& value)
1686  {
1687  value.write(out, NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
1688  }
1689 
1690  // Be aware that T can be varuint, so bitSizeOf cannot return constant value.
1692  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1693 };
1694 
1698 template <typename T, typename ELEMENT_FACTORY = void>
1699 class ObjectArrayTraits
1700 {
1701 public:
1707  explicit ObjectArrayTraits(const ELEMENT_FACTORY& elementFactory) : m_elementFactory(elementFactory)
1708  {
1709  }
1710 
1712  typedef T type;
1713 
1721  void read(std::vector<type>& array, BitStreamReader& in, size_t index) const
1722  {
1723  m_elementFactory.create(array, in, index);
1724  }
1725 
1726 private:
1727  const ELEMENT_FACTORY& m_elementFactory;
1728 };
1729 
1733 template <typename T>
1734 class ObjectArrayTraits<T>
1735 {
1736 public:
1738  typedef T type;
1739 
1748  static size_t bitSizeOf(size_t bitPosition, const type& value)
1749  {
1750  return value.bitSizeOf(bitPosition);
1751  }
1752 
1761  static size_t initializeOffsets(size_t bitPosition, type& value)
1762  {
1763  return value.initializeOffsets(bitPosition);
1764  }
1765 
1772  static void write(BitStreamWriter& out, type& value)
1773  {
1774  value.write(out, NO_PRE_WRITE_ACTION);
1775  }
1776 
1778  static const bool IS_BITSIZEOF_CONSTANT = false;
1779 };
1780 
1781 } // namespace zserio
